verses.verse: Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "What <S%H2005>if<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> me, or <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H6963>what<s%> I <S%H6963>say<s%>? For they may <S%H559>say,<s%> 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to you.'"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> is that in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "A <S%H4294>staff.<s%>"

Then He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7993>"Throw<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground.<s%>" So he <S%H7993>threw<s%> it on the <S%H776>ground,<s%> and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H5175>serpent;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> from it.

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H7971>"Stretch<s%> out your <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H270>grasp<s%> [it] by its <S%H2180>tail<s%>" – so he <S%H7971>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H2388>caught<s%> it, and it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4294>staff<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand<s%> –

"that they may <S%H539>believe<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers, the <S%H1>God<s%> of <S%H430>Abraham,<s%> the <S%H85>God<s%> of <S%H430>Isaac,<s%> and the <S%H3327>God<s%> of <S%H430>Jacob,<s%> has <S%H3290>appeared<s%> to you."

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5750>furthermore<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H935>put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom.<s%>" So he <S%H935>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H6879>leprous<s%> like <S%H7950>snow.<s%>

Then He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7725>"Put<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>" So he <S%H7725>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> into his <S%H2436>bosom<s%> <S%H7725>again;<s%> and when he <S%H3318>took<s%> it out of his <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it was <S%H7725>restored<s%> like [the rest of] his <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> you or <S%H8085>heed<s%> the <S%H6963>witness<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H226>sign,<s%> they may <S%H539>believe<s%> the <S%H6963>witness<s%> of the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H226>sign.<s%>

"But it shall be that <S%H518>if<s%> they will not <S%H539>believe<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> or <S%H8085>heed<s%> <S%H6963>what<s%> you <S%H6963>say,<s%> then you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> from the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> and <S%H8210>pour<s%> it on the <S%H3004>dry<s%> <S%H3004>ground;<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3947>take<s%> from the <S%H2975>Nile<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H3006>dry<s%> <S%H3006>ground.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H994>"Please,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I have <S%H3808>never<s%> been <S%H376>eloquent,<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H4480>recently<s%> <S%H8543><s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> in <S%H8032>time<s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H9241>since<s%> Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for I am <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H6310>speech<s%> and <S%H3515>slow<s%> of <S%H3956>tongue.<s%>"

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4310>"Who<s%> has <S%H7760>made<s%> man's <S%H6310>mouth<s%>? <S%H176>Or<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H7760>makes<s%> [him] <S%H483>dumb<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2795>deaf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H6493>seeing<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H5787>blind<s%>? Is it not I, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?
<S%H6258>"Now<s%> then <S%H1980>go,<s%> and I, even I, will be with your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H3384>teach<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> you are to <S%H1696>say.<s%>"
But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"Please,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> [the message] by whomever Thou <S%H7971>wilt.<s%>"

Then the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2734>burned<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Is there not your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%>? I <S%H3045>know<s%> that he <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H1696>fluently.<s%> And <S%H1571>moreover,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is <S%H3318>coming<s%> out to <S%H7122>meet<s%> you; when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> you, he will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

"And you are to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him and <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> and I, even I, will be with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and I will <S%H3384>teach<s%> you <S%H834>what<s%> you are to <S%H6213>do.<s%>

"Moreover, he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> for you to the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that he shall be as a <S%H6310>mouth<s%> for you, and you shall be as <S%H430>God<s%> to him.
"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4294>staff,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>perform<s%> the <S%H226>signs.<s%>"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1980>departed<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3500>Jethro<s%> his father-in-law, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4994>"Please,<s%> let me <S%H1980>go,<s%> that I may <S%H7725>return<s%> to my <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> are in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> if they are <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>" And <S%H3503>Jethro<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> who were <S%H1245>seeking<s%> your <S%H5315>life<s%> are <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"

So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H7392>mounted<s%> them on a <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and he <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> also <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> "When you <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> that you <S%H6213>perform<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4159>wonders<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7760>put<s%> in your <S%H3027>power;<s%> but I will <S%H2388>harden<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%> so that he will not <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go.<s%>
"Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3478>"Israel<s%> is My <S%H1121>son,<s%> My first-born.

"So I <S%H559>said<s%> to you, <S%H7971>'Let<s%> My <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that he may <S%H5647>serve<s%> Me'; but you have <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H7971>let<s%> him <S%H7971>go.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H2026>kill<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your first-born."' "

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H4411>lodging<s%> <S%H4411>place<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6298>met<s%> him and <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

Then <S%H6855>Zipporah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6864>flint<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> her son's <S%H6190>foreskin<s%> and <S%H5060>threw<s%> [it] at Moses' <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are <S%H3588>indeed<s%> a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%> to me."
So He <S%H7503>let<s%> him <S%H7503>alone.<s%> At that <S%H227>time<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> "[You are] a <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>" – because of the <S%H4139>circumcision.<s%>

Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>" So he <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6298>met<s%> him at the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> He had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> that He had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him [to do.]
Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H622>assembled<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> He then <S%H6213>performed<s%> the <S%H226>signs<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H539>believed;<s%> and when they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H6485>concerned<s%> about the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and that He had <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> then they <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>low<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>
